messages.title: I need your help to change Britain.
messages.content: The Labour Government has been a disappointment. And in Guildford they are in third place. Look at the result last time: [election results data]

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will put more police on patrol to keep our streets safe.
We will fight to protect the frontline NHS services that we all rely on.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In this area, it's a choice between Sue Doughty and the Conservatives. There were only 347 votes in it last time. This time your vote could decide who wins.

issues.economy: The Conservatives are bankrolled by Belize billionaire Lord Ashcroft. He has dodged paying £100million in UK taxes. So it's no surprise that the Conservatives' top priority is cutting taxes for millionaires.
issues.health: Our NHS and other vital public services won't be safe with the Tories.

quotes.text: PS - Remember, the election in Guildford is a choice between the Lib Dems or the Conservatives. Voting Labour could just help the Tories win.
